dependencies.NEKRS_HOME: Path to the NekRS installation directory
dependencies.PROJ_ID: Project ID for the SLURM allocation
dependencies.QUEUE: SLURM queue to submit the job
dependencies.NEKRS_CACHE_BCAST: Flag for caching the broadcast data
dependencies.NEKRS_SKIP_BUILD_ONLY: Flag for skipping the build-only phase
dependencies.nodes: Number of compute nodes to use
dependencies.ROMIO_HINTS: Path to the ROMIO hints file
